name: Caveman Adventure Island [Full Unity Source Code]
name_original: Caveman Adventure Island [Full Unity Source Code]
description:
Features: 

♦ This is a complete unity project: Full resource, full animation.

♦ 2D graphics – Easy to reskill

♦ Many different enemies.

♦ Many different locations

♦ 16 levels with many lands, and more 30 enemies + bosses.

♦ Support multi-platform: Android, iOS, Web player, PC…

♦ Support build 64bit

Recommended Unity 2019.4.40f1 or higher

You are the lonely forest people on this adventure island, you have to fight the monster, overcome obstacles such a rocks, bonfires ... for keep yourself safe. You will play as a hero to rescue the princess of an island which is arrested by a dark sorcerer. Through each region, you will enjoy the different tracks.

The brave primitive boy have to overcome the difficulties, handle various monsters, pass variety types of traps. He will go through vast oceans, cold glaciers, mysterious jungles and dark caves. Luckily our brave primitive boy Tiny Yaho collects the coins, gets stars, solves music notes, find surprise items, learns cool transform skills. Then he transforms to the little cute Fire Dragon who can breathe out the fire. He transforms to the agile Indian Boy who can air hike to jump more far and avoid the traps. He transforms to the lithe Bird Man who can fall slowly in the air to collect coins, avoid traps and get surprise items.

Play Adventure Island game is very easy: touch to screen to jump for eat banana, evade obstacle.
